transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan sir, namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar.
Executive: Sir call receive nahi kar rahe aap?
Customer: Uh call receive nahi kar rahe?
Executive: Adarsh bol raha hu mai IndiaMART se. Hemanth sir Hemanth sir baat kar rahe hai kya?
Customer: Nahi Hemanth ji mai Hemanth ka manager baat kar raha hu Adarsh. Aapka shubh naam sir? Company ka naam bata dijiye ek baar.
Customer: Sir Gaurav Enterprises se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Achha Gaurav Enterprises se aap? Dhakkan ji bol rahe hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Adarsh bol raha hu sir. Aapko baat toh hui thi aapki taraf se Trpti se. Call toh aaya tha aapko number diya nahi Trpti ne aapko abhi?
Customer: Kisne hui sir hamari toh koi baat hi nahi. Woh keh rahe hai. Abhi toh baat unse hui na. Abhi abhi aap mujhe account manager. Haan.
Executive: Aap boliye sir. Mai kya chahiye?
Customer: Mai keh raha hu aapke paas Trpti ka call aaya tha 7 tarikh se.
Executive: Ek minute ya toh aap boliye ya aap boliye sir pehle.
Customer: Kyunki hamare jo account manager woh Hemanth sir hai ya aur koi hai?
Executive: Hemanth nahi hai. Hemanth nahi hai abhi available. Hemanth ka Hemanth ne job chhod di hai. Abhi aapke account manager Trpti hai.
Customer: Achha unhone job chhod di?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Abhi toh matlab ek unse baat hui thi woh keh rahe the ki unka promotion ho gaya hai ab aap keh rahe hai ki unhone job chhod di.
Executive: Nahi abhi abhi inka job abhi inka job chhod di. Abhi unhone job chhod di hai sir. Dekhiye dekhiye sir. Mai toh keh raha hu koi dikkat nahi hai. Baki dekhiye woh jo baat hui thi ek message aaya tha jaise complaint ke regarding thik hai. Toh unki humne payment refund kar di thik hai. Toh jinhone humko message kiya tha ki aap inse baat kar lijiye. Toh humne unko thodi bhi bhej diya toh woh keh rahe hai aap apne unhone bola kal aapka TrustSeal ho jayega thik hai. Fir woh abhi kya ki apne account manager se contact kijiye.
Customer: Toh account manager ka number nahi tha aapke paas?
Customer: Mere paas number hi nahi tha unhi ka toh Hemanth sir ka hi hai bas. Aur mai unko din bhi call kiya unhone fir bhi call kaat diya mere ko char panch baar call kiya. Aapko haan woh nahi hai woh. Koi baat nahi abhi Trpti Trpti se aapki 7 tarikh ko baat hui thi sir aapki. Aapko shayad yaad nahi ho. Trpti se 7 November ko aapka discussion hua tha.
Customer: Sir woh call woh baat wohi aapke account manager hai.
Executive: Koi nahi mai Trpti ko bol dunga woh aapko hi likh degi WhatsApp pe. Dekhiye aap se discussion kar lenge aur batao iske alawa kuch aur problem ho. Problem toh aapke sare solve ho gaye jo buyer supplier ke the. Toh customer decide se. Nahi nahi abhi shayad mere ko lag raha hai kal kal nahi sir. Uh kal ya parso sir kal complaint aaya tha koi thik hai humko message aaya tha.
Executive: 8 tarikh ko?
Customer: Message.
Executive: 8 tarikh ko batao samjhe ek minute. Haan haan 200 rupaye ka.
Customer: 8 tarikh 200 rupaye ka 200 rupaye ka.
Executive: Toh maine unko pay. Ji haan refund karwa diya hai.
Executive: Haan ho gaya sir woh solve ho gaya.
Customer: Toh solve ho gaya toh wohi maine unse pucha ki sir kab ho jayega toh unhone bataya kal ho jayega toh unhone fir abhi unhone bola apne account manager se discuss kar lijiye. Maine kaha thik hai koi dikkat nahi hai toh maine unko hi call kiya Hemanth sir ka hi number mere paas aur kisi ka toh number hi nahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Koi nahi mera bhi number tha aapke paas. Mere paas number mere mera number tha na aapke paas Adarsh ke naam se aapne save nahi kiya tha?
Customer: Nahi sir aap aapne toh meri contact hi nahi ek aad baar hua hoga contact beech mein mere ko lagta hai.
Executive: Kai baar hamari baat hui hai sir koi baat nahi abhi kai baar baat hui. Koi nahi sir keh raha hu baat.
Customer: Tabhi maine ispe call kiya hai nahi toh mai mai call hi nahi karta.
Executive: Koi nahi koi nahi koi nahi koi nahi. Uh aapne mai aapko number de deta hu Trpti ka. Trpti ko direct aap kabhi bhi call kar lena aur iske alawa kuch aur janna hai toh mujhe batao kuch aur janna hai service se related.
Customer: TrustSeal kab chalu ho jayega sir?
Executive: TrustSeal ho jayega sir TrustSeal toh aapka already mere hisab se dekho dekho.
Customer: Ho gaya chalu sir? Show hi nahi ho raha hai isliye.
Executive: Ho gaya ho gaya ho gaya. Haan haan check karo catalog pe aa raha hai aapka chalu ho gaya.
Customer: In complaint aate mai turant uske action le raha hu turant aapke paas.
Executive: Koshish kiya karo koshish kiya karo ki complaint na aaye sir customer ko thoda touch mein raha karo. Koshish kiya karo.
Customer: Sir pata hai kya dikkat aati isme ye portal ki jankari aapko aisa hai thik hai aur thodi bhi isme dikkat hoti hai banda turant complaint kar deta hai aur isme.
Executive: Nahi usse usse matlab customer se touch mein raha karo usse puch liya karo ki koi problem hai usse just by deliver ho jata hai na. Kyunki jitni jitni jyada complaint aayengi na sir aapki negative marking jati hai na ki aap customer ke baar baar complaint issue ho raha hai koi negative feedback de dega thoda sa negative padta hai sir toh complaint kam aani chahiye. Baki use kariye koi aur problem hai toh mujhe bataiyega mai Trpti ko bol dunga woh aapke connect bhi kar legi service se related. Thik hai abhi jo hai aapko koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Haan haan abhi mai conversation close kar du aapke paas feedback jayega satisfied mark kar dena baki koi aur problem hota hai toh batana sir thik hai.
Executive: Mai Trpti ko bol dunga woh aapko WhatsApp pe hi kar degi thik hai. Okay.
Customer: Ji. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's TrustSeal is not active.

- Wants to know when TrustSeal will be activated.

- Received a complaint message for 200 rupees.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed TrustSeal is active.

- Executive will inform Trpti to connect with customer.

- Executive provided Trpti's number to the customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, trustseal, account manager, complaint

seller_categories.mcat_name: Sex Toys For Men and Women
Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
